name: Goa Institute
description: Goa Institute of Management, located in Sanquelim, Goa, is approved by the All-India Council of Technical Education (AICTE), for offering postgraduate courses in management. The campus also hosts the Atal Incubation Centre (AIC-GIM), set up in collaboration with NITI Aayog to support start-ups and entrepreneurs.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Creating ethical and responsible leaders since 199
ShortDescription: Goa Institute of Management (GIM), rated amongst the Top-4 Pioneering B-Schools by The Positive Impact Rating for Business Schools, is committed to developing students who transform into tomorrow's responsible and ethical leaders with a focus on sustainable business practices.
enhanced_description: Goa Institute of Management (GIM), located in Sanquelim, Goa, is approved by the All-India Council of Technical Education (AICTE), for offering postgraduate courses in management. Recognized as a pioneering B-School, rated among the Top-4 by The Positive Impact Rating for Business Schools, GIM is committed to developing students who transform into tomorrow's responsible and ethical leaders with a focus on sustainable business practices. The campus also hosts the Atal Incubation Centre (AIC-GIM), set up in collaboration with NITI Aayog to support start-ups and entrepreneurs.
key_use_cases: Skill Development and Learning Efficiency Enhancement
Training in Ethical and Sustainable Business Practices
competitive_advantages: Government-backed Startup Incubation (AIC-GIM in collaboration with NITI Aayog)
Focus on Ethical Leadership and Sustainability
High Ranking and Reputation (Top-4 Pioneering B-School by The Positive Impact Rating)
roi_benefits: Development of Ethical and Responsible Leaders
